17 SQFitter::SQFitter(ros::NodeHandle &node, const std::string &segmentation_service,
18  const std::string &cloud_topic, const std::string &output_frame,
19  const SQFitter::Parameters &params)
20  : nh_(node), cloud_(new PointCloud),
21  filtered_cloud_(new PointCloud), cut_cloud_(new PointCloud), output_frame_(output_frame)
22 {
23 
24  cloud_sub_ = nh_.subscribe(cloud_topic, 1, &SQFitter::cloud_callback, this);
25  table_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("table",10);
26  objects_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("segmented_objects",10);
27  filtered_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("filtered_cloud",10);
28  superquadrics_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("superquadrics",10);
29  poses_pub_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("sq_poses",10);
30 
31 
32  cut_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("cut_cloud", 10);
33 
34 
35  client_= nh_.serviceClient<sq_fitting::segment_object>("/segmentation_service");
36  service_ = nh_.advertiseService("sqs", &SQFitter::serviceCallback, this);
37 
38  this->sq_param_ = params;
39  this->initialized = true;
40  Objects_.resize(0);
41  pVector_.resize(0);
42 }

48 bool SQFitter::serviceCallback(sq_fitting::get_sq::Request &req, sq_fitting::get_sq::Response &res)
49 {
50  std::cout<<"Service callback started"<<std::endl;
51  std::cout<<"Request received to send back SQ"<<std::endl;
52  res.sqs = sqArr_;
53  res.table_center = table_center_;
54  std::cout<<"Sending back: "<<sqArr_.sqs.size()<<" superquadrics";
55  std::cout<<"Table center: "<<table_center_.x <<" "<<table_center_.y<<" "

59 void SQFitter::cloud_callback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& input)
60 {
61  ROS_INFO("Cloud Received");
62  pcl::fromROSMsg(input, *cloud_);
63  this->input_msg_ = input;
64 
65  filterWorkSpace(this->cloud_, this->filtered_cloud_);
66  pcl::toROSMsg(*filtered_cloud_, this->ws_filtered_cloud_ros_);
67 
68  getSegmentedObjects(this->filtered_cloud_);
69 
70  //auto start = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
71  fitAndSample(this->Objects_,this->pVector_);
72  //auto finish_fit = std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
73  //std::chrono::duration<double> elapsed_fit = finish_fit - start;
74  //std::cout<<"Elapsed toral time: "<<elapsed_fit.count()<<std::endl;
75

79 void SQFitter::transformFrameCloud(const CloudPtr& cloud_in, CloudPtr& cloud_out)
80 {
81  if(output_frame_ != this->input_msg_.header.frame_id){
82  tf::TransformListener listener;
83  tf::StampedTransform transform;
84  try{
85  listener.waitForTransform(output_frame_,this->input_msg_.header.frame_id,ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
86  listener.lookupTransform(output_frame_, this->input_msg_.header.frame_id,ros::Time(0), transform);
87 
88  geometry_msgs::Pose inter_pose;
89  inter_pose.position.x = transform.getOrigin().x();
90  inter_pose.position.y = transform.getOrigin().y();
91  inter_pose.position.z = transform.getOrigin().z();
92  inter_pose.orientation.x = transform.getRotation().getX();
93  inter_pose.orientation.y = transform.getRotation().getY();
94  inter_pose.orientation.z = transform.getRotation().getZ();
95  inter_pose.orientation.w = transform.getRotation().getW();
96  Eigen::Affine3d transform_in_eigen;
97  tf::poseMsgToEigen(inter_pose, transform_in_eigen);
98  pcl::transformPointCloud (*cloud_in, *cloud_out, transform_in_eigen);
99  cloud_out->header.frame_id = output_frame_;
100  }
101  catch (tf::TransformException ex){
102  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
103  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
104  }
105  }
106  else
107  cloud_out = cloud_in;
108 }
109 
110 void SQFitter::transformFrameCloudBack(const CloudPtr& cloud_in, CloudPtr& cloud_out)
111 {
112  if(output_frame_ == this->input_msg_.header.frame_id)
113  {
114  std::cout<<"Ok till now"<<std::endl;
115  }
116  else{
117 
118  tf::TransformListener listener;
119  tf::StampedTransform transform;
120  try{
121 
122  listener.waitForTransform( this->input_msg_.header.frame_id, output_frame_,ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
123  listener.lookupTransform(this->input_msg_.header.frame_id, output_frame_,ros::Time(0), transform);
124 
125  geometry_msgs::Pose inter_pose;
126  inter_pose.position.x = transform.getOrigin().x();
127  inter_pose.position.y = transform.getOrigin().y();
128  inter_pose.position.z = transform.getOrigin().z();
129  inter_pose.orientation.x = transform.getRotation().getX();
130  inter_pose.orientation.y = transform.getRotation().getY();
131  inter_pose.orientation.z = transform.getRotation().getZ();
132  inter_pose.orientation.w = transform.getRotation().getW();
133  Eigen::Affine3d transform_in_eigen;
134  tf::poseMsgToEigen(inter_pose, transform_in_eigen);
135  pcl::transformPointCloud (*cloud_in, *cloud_out, transform_in_eigen);
136  cloud_out->header.frame_id = this->input_msg_.header.frame_id;
137 
138  }
139  catch (tf::TransformException ex){
140  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
141  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
142  }
143 
144  }
145 }
146 
147 void SQFitter::filterWorkSpace(const CloudPtr& cloud, CloudPtr& filtered_cloud)
148 {
149  CloudPtr transform_cloud(new PointCloud);
150  transformFrameCloud(cloud, transform_cloud);
151  CloudPtr cloud_nan(new PointCloud);
152  pcl::CropBox<PointT> crop;
153  crop.setInputCloud(transform_cloud);
154  Eigen::Vector4f min;
155  min<<sq_param_.ws_limits[0] ,sq_param_.ws_limits[2],sq_param_.ws_limits[4], 1;
156  Eigen::Vector4f max;
157  max<<sq_param_.ws_limits[1],sq_param_.ws_limits[3], sq_param_.ws_limits[5], 1;
158  crop.setMin(min);
159  crop.setMax(max);
160  if(this->sq_param_.remove_nan){
161  crop.filter(*cloud_nan);
162  std::vector<int> indices;
163  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*cloud_nan, *filtered_cloud, indices);
164  }
165  else
166  crop.filter(*filtered_cloud);
167 }
168 
169 void SQFitter::filter_StatOutlier(CloudPtr &cloud_in, CloudPtr &cloud_out)
170 {
171  pcl::StatisticalOutlierRemoval<PointT> sor;
172  sor.setInputCloud (cloud_in);
173  sor.setMeanK (1);
174  sor.setStddevMulThresh (0.5);
175  sor.filter (*cloud_out);
176 }
177 
178 void SQFitter::filter_RadiusOutlier(CloudPtr &cloud_in, CloudPtr &cloud_out)
179 {
180  pcl::RadiusOutlierRemoval<PointT> outrem;
181  outrem.setInputCloud(cloud_in);
182  outrem.setRadiusSearch(0.05);
183  outrem.setMinNeighborsInRadius (1);
184  outrem.filter (*cloud_out);
185 }
186 
187 void SQFitter::mirror_cloud(CloudPtr &cloud_in, CloudPtr &cloud_out)
188 {
189  double x, y,z;
190  getCenter(cloud_in, x, y, z);
191  geometry_msgs::Pose pose_in;
192  pose_in.position.x = x;
193  pose_in.position.y = y;
194  pose_in.position.z = z;
195  pose_in.orientation.w = 1.0;
196 
197  Eigen::Affine3d pose_in_eigen;
198  tf::poseMsgToEigen(pose_in, pose_in_eigen);
199  Eigen::Affine3d pose_inv = pose_in_eigen.inverse();
200  PointCloud::Ptr to_center(new PointCloud);
201  PointCloud::Ptr cloud_mirror(new PointCloud);
202  PointCloud::Ptr cloud_mirror_trns(new PointCloud);
203  pcl::transformPointCloud (*cloud_in, *to_center, pose_inv);
204 
205  for(int i=0;i<to_center->points.size();++i)
206  {
207  PointT point;
208  point.x = -(to_center->points.at(i).x);
209  point.y = -(to_center->points.at(i).y);
210  point.z = -(to_center->points.at(i).z);
211  cloud_mirror->points.push_back(point);
212  }
213  cloud_mirror->header.frame_id = cloud_in->header.frame_id;
214 
215  cloud_mirror->width = cloud_mirror->points.size();
216  cloud_mirror->height = 1;
217  cloud_mirror->is_dense = true;
218  pcl::transformPointCloud (*cloud_mirror, *cloud_mirror_trns, pose_in_eigen);
219 
220  for(size_t i=0;i<cloud_mirror_trns->points.size();++i)
221  {
222  cloud_out->points.push_back(cloud_mirror_trns->points.at(i));
223  cloud_out->points.push_back(cloud_in->points.at(i));
224  }
225 
226  cloud_out->width = cloud_out->points.size();
227  cloud_out->height = 1;
228  cloud_out->is_dense = true;
229  cloud_out->header.frame_id = cloud_in->header.frame_id;
230  geometry_msgs::Pose pose_out;
231  transformFrame(pose_in, pose_out);
232  //createCenterMarker(pose_out.position.x, pose_out.position.y, pose_out.position.z );
233 }
234 
235 void SQFitter::transformFrame(const geometry_msgs::Pose &pose_in, geometry_msgs::Pose& pose_out)
236 {
237 
238  if(output_frame_ == this->input_msg_.header.frame_id)
239  {
240  std::cout<<"Ok till now"<<std::endl;
241  pose_out = pose_in;
242  }
243  else{
244 
245  tf::TransformListener listener;
246  tf::StampedTransform transform;
247  try{
248 
249  listener.waitForTransform( output_frame_,this->input_msg_.header.frame_id,ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
250  listener.lookupTransform(output_frame_, this->input_msg_.header.frame_id,ros::Time(0), transform);
251 
252 
253  geometry_msgs::Pose inter_pose;
254  inter_pose.position.x = transform.getOrigin().x();
255  inter_pose.position.y = transform.getOrigin().y();
256  inter_pose.position.z = transform.getOrigin().z();
257  inter_pose.orientation.x = transform.getRotation().getX();
258  inter_pose.orientation.y = transform.getRotation().getY();
259  inter_pose.orientation.z = transform.getRotation().getZ();
260  inter_pose.orientation.w = transform.getRotation().getW();
261  Eigen::Affine3d transform_in_eigen;
262  tf::poseMsgToEigen(inter_pose, transform_in_eigen);
263 
264  Eigen::Affine3f pose_in_eigen;
265  sq_create_transform(pose_in, pose_in_eigen);
266 
267  tf::poseEigenToMsg( transform_in_eigen * pose_in_eigen.cast<double>(), pose_out );
268 
269 
270  }
271  catch (tf::TransformException ex){
272  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
273  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
274  }
275 
276  }
277 }
278 
279 void SQFitter::getSegmentedObjects(CloudPtr& cloud)
280 {
281  Objects_.resize(0);
282  std::vector<CloudPtr> segmented_clouds;
283  CloudPtr transform_cloud(new PointCloud);
284  transformFrameCloudBack(cloud, transform_cloud);
285  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 cloud_msg;
286  pcl::toROSMsg(*transform_cloud, cloud_msg);
287  sq_fitting::segment_object srv;
288  srv.request.input_cloud = cloud_msg;
289  if(client_.call(srv)){
290  table_cloud_ = srv.response.plane_cloud;
291  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> segmented_objects_cloud;
292  for(int i=0;i<srv.response.object_cloud.size();++i){
293  CloudPtr tmp(new PointCloud);
294  pcl::fromROSMsg(srv.response.object_cloud[i], *tmp);
295  segmented_clouds.push_back(tmp);
296  float r = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
297  float g = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
298  float b = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
299  for(int j=0;j<tmp->points.size();++j){
300  pcl::PointXYZRGB temp_point;
301  temp_point.x = tmp->points.at(j).x;
302  temp_point.y = tmp->points.at(j).y;
303  temp_point.z = tmp->points.at(j).z;
304  temp_point.r = r * 255;
305  temp_point.g = g * 255;
306  temp_point.b = b * 255;
307  segmented_objects_cloud.points.push_back(temp_point);
308  }
309  }
310  segmented_objects_cloud.width = segmented_objects_cloud.points.size();
311  segmented_objects_cloud.height = 1;
312  segmented_objects_cloud.is_dense = true;
313  CloudPtr transform_cloud_back(new PointCloud);
314  transformFrameCloud(segmented_objects_cloud.makeShared(), transform_cloud_back);
315  pcl::toROSMsg(*transform_cloud_back, objects_cloud_ros_);
316  objects_cloud_ros_.header.seq = 1;
317  objects_cloud_ros_.header.frame_id = this->output_frame_;
318  objects_cloud_ros_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
319  }
320 
321  //transforming every segmented point cloud to output frame
322  for(int i=0;i<segmented_clouds.size();++i){
323  CloudPtr temp_cloud(new PointCloud);
324  transformFrameCloud(segmented_clouds[i], temp_cloud);
325  Objects_.push_back(temp_cloud);
326  }
327 }
328 
329 void SQFitter::fitAndSampleTh(CloudPtr &cloud_in,std::string& method, ParamMultiVector& pvector){
330  std::unique_ptr<SuperquadricFitting> fit(new SuperquadricFitting(cloud_in));
331  if(!fit->set_pose_est_method(method))
332  ROS_ERROR("Method not recognized");
333  fit->fit();
334  sq_fitting::sq min_param;
335  fit->getMinParams(min_param);
336 
337  std::unique_ptr<Sampling> samp(new Sampling(min_param));
338  CloudPtr sq_cloud(new PointCloud);
339  samp->sample_pilu_fisher();
340  samp->getCloud(sq_cloud);
341  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> blck(mu_);
342  pvector.push_back(std::make_pair(min_param, sq_cloud));
343 }
344 
345 void SQFitter::fitAndSample(std::vector<CloudPtr>& objs, ParamMultiVector& pvector){
346  pvector.clear();
347  pvector.reserve(objs.size());
348  poseArr_.poses.resize(0);
349  sqArr_.sqs.resize(0);
350  std::vector<std::thread> threads;
351  for(int i=0;i<this->Objects_.size();++i)
352  {
353  threads.push_back(std::thread(&SQFitter::fitAndSampleTh, this, std::ref(objs[i]),
354  std::ref(sq_param_.pose_est_method),std::ref(pvector)));
355  }
356  for(auto &t:threads)
357  t.join();
358 
359  CloudPtr sq_cloud_pcl(new PointCloud);
360  for(ParamMultiVector::iterator it = pvector.begin(); it !=pvector.end();++it){
361  *sq_cloud_pcl+=*(it->second);
362  sq_fitting::sq param = it->first;
363  poseArr_.poses.push_back(param.pose);
364  sqArr_.sqs.push_back(param);
365  }
366  ROS_INFO("Fitted %lu Objects",pvector.size());
367  //std::cout<<"Size of cloud: "<<sq_cloud_pcl->points.size()<<std::endl;
368  sq_cloud_pcl->height = 1;
369  sq_cloud_pcl->width = sq_cloud_pcl->points.size();
370  sq_cloud_pcl->is_dense = true;
371  pcl::toROSMsg(*sq_cloud_pcl, sq_cloud_);
372  sq_cloud_.header.seq = 1;
373  sq_cloud_.header.frame_id = output_frame_;
374  sq_cloud_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
375 
376  sqArr_.header.frame_id = output_frame_;
377  sqArr_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
378  poseArr_.header.frame_id = output_frame_;
379  poseArr_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
380 
381 }
382 
383 void SQFitter::publishClouds()
384 {
385  table_pub_.publish(table_cloud_);
386  objects_pub_.publish(objects_cloud_ros_);
387  filtered_cloud_pub_.publish(ws_filtered_cloud_ros_);
388  superquadrics_pub_.publish(sq_cloud_);
389  poses_pub_.publish(poseArr_);
390 
391 
392  cut_cloud_pub_.publish(cut_cloud_ros_);
393 }

396 void SQFitter::fit()
397 {
398  if(this->initialized = true)
399  {
400  ros::Rate rate(1);
401  //ROS_INFO("Fitting superquadrics");
402  while(ros::ok())
403  {
404  publishClouds();
405  ros::spinOnce();
406  rate.sleep();
407  }
408  }
409 }
